ygData.subject: Re: LVL 12 Troll Shaman looking for guid
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as armor-- it simply depends on how much money you have. Of course you want to try to get something better than Banded-- but can you afford
ygData.messageBody:
As far as armor-- it simply depends on how much
money you have. Of course you want to try to get
something better than Banded-- but can you afford
it?<br><br>The thing I look at always is -- do I have enough
money to purchase all the spells I want to get in my
next circle of spells. If I have enough, then I will
go ahead and buy. If not... no dice.
<br><br>Unfortunately, I'm not a very experienced player for the levels
18 and above. However, I've got at least 12
characters between level 4 and 16. (Probably a lot more).
And I've grouped almost all my character's lives past
level 4. <br><br>So now with my level 22nd Druid, I
keep looking at EQ web sites for info on armor and
weapons. That'd be my advice for you. Look and try to find
out what you're looking for and ask for price checks
on the item in your server.<br><br>I don't have much
experience with Evil races unfortunately, but as far as
killing-- both Derv camps and Lavastorm will be cool places
to kill... HOWEVER-- Lavastorm is much less camped
and if you're looking for a group (and I always
am)... I prefer Derv camps. Easy to form a group up
there. Exp will be a lot smoother b/c of grouping.
<br><br>If you're looking to solo though, Lavastorm is
perfect. I hate the Downtime from recovering from a fight
though. I did Lavastorm for a while and only got into two
groups. One was prearranged with friends ahead of time.
<br><br>Hope this helps...<br><br>shooman out... aka Fatedhue
Prismatic of the Drinal Server.<br><br>PS Another comment
about the Derv Camps. Dervs drop cutthroat rings. These
can be used in quests to improve faction I believe.
That might be a consideration. If you can kill
efficiently in a constant stream in a group at Lavastorm
though, I found loot to be great for level 12-15 range--
although by 15 my exp there wasn't that great. By level 15
I was in Oasis.
